about_the_game:
"Not just wealthy—I'm Rich in every way."

Exclusively crafted for those who appreciate the finer things in life. Join an elite circle of people who value rarity, luxury, and prestige. With I'm Rich, you’re not just proving your success—you’re celebrating it.

What you can expect with I’m Rich:

  • Use the Im Rich button to edit your motto and express your personal statement in a world of exclusivity. "Not just wealthy—I'm Rich in every way." is our own motto, craft the motto that better suits your lifestyle!

  • Expand your Steam achievements based on your wealth.

By purchasing I’m Rich, you join a unique community that values prestige and individuality. If you appreciate the art of exclusivity and want to make a statement, I’m Rich is your perfect choice.

Note: This title is not a traditional game with objectives or challenges. Instead, it is a digital status symbol, providing a creative platform for expressing wealth and success.

name: I'm Rich

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 140 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 140 MB available space
